articles.title: U.S. lawmaker wants Biden to take 'unilateral action' on reopening border with Canada - CTV News
articles.description: An American congressman says he has proposed to the White House to unilaterally reopen the border to Canadians as Ottawa announced another month extension of the restrictions that prohibit non-essential travel.

articles.title: Louis Oosthuizen's stunning 52-foot eagle putt hands him share of US Open lead - News24

articles.title: How Americans Are Celebrating Juneteenth This Year - NPR
articles.description: Juneteenth events are happening across the country, honoring the 156th anniversary of what is often considered the end of slavery in the United States.
articles.content:
People watch the Juneteenth Parade in historic Galveston, Texas on Saturday where 156 years ago news reached the city that slavery had been abolished.
